## Options.tls property

Encrypt the gRPC connection with TLS.

**Signature:**

```typescript
tls: boolean | SecureContext;
```

## Remarks

Possible values are

- `false` - communicate via plaintext;

- `true` - encrypt the connection with TLS, verifying the server identity with the default set of well-known root certificate authorities; or

- the result of calling [tls.createSecureContext](https://nodejs.org/api/tls.html#tlscreatesecurecontextoptions)<!-- -->, to configure custom root certificate authorities or client certificates for mutual TLS.
